definition: class division into proletariat and bourgeoisie class enemy, in use esp. during the Cultural Revolution

sentences.english: The last one of the pure-blooded vampires of the third generation in far east.
sentences.chinese: 遠東最後一個血統純正的第三代吸血鬼。

sentences.english: One of the reasons is that a great many have foreign origins themselves.
sentences.chinese: 其中一個原因是他們中的很多人都有外國血統。

sentences.english: Lineage is passed on the stallion side.
The blood of Chinese traditional culture is running its way in the veins of Long Ing-Jhong's Oeuvre.
sentences.chinese: 龍瑛宗文學的血統裏流淌着中華傳統文化的血液。

sentences.english: Mystical bloodlines are only important when continuing a dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 血統只在延續朝代的時候起作用。

sentences.english: I would lie and say that I am actually half white.
sentences.chinese: 我撒謊說自己實際上有一半的白種人血統。

sentences.english: Yellow John ROM, to start the famous bloodline.
sentences.chinese: 黃約翰光盤，開始著名的血統。

sentences.english: The game's French origins also account for some of its unique terminology.
sentences.chinese: 網球的法國血統也可以解釋現今一些專用術語的由來。

sentences.english: You will not be an American president unless you are linked and a part of this bloodline.
sentences.chinese: 如果你和這個血統沒有關係，你是沒法當總統的。

sentences.english: The pureblood prejudice towards Muggle-borns is also largely insubstantial.
sentences.chinese: 純血統巫師對於麻瓜出身巫師的偏見其實也毫無根據。

sentences.english: Haden is in the pedigree of most of the Florida mango cultivars.
sentences.chinese: Haden在佛羅里達州大多數芒果血統中都存在。

sentences.english: My wife proved up on her Cherokee blood.
sentences.chinese: 我妻子證明具有柴羅基部族人的血統。

sentences.english: Her name is appearing in the pedigrees of many different winners around the U.
sentences.chinese: 它的名字出現在英國周圍很多不同的冠軍的血統書中。

sentences.english: Her mother was a full blood Cherokee Indian.
sentences.chinese: 母親的母親是純正的切羅基印第安血統。

sentences.english: They are both cousins of his, but not of the same degree of propinquity .
sentences.chinese: 他們兩個都是他的表親，但在血統上親疏不同。

sentences.english: That is why it is essential to study the pedigrees of your mating pair.
sentences.chinese: 這就是爲什麼對於交配犬隻血統的瞭解是如此的重要。

definition: to inherit/to succeed to (the throne etc)/to carry on (a tradition etc)
legendary/fantasy saga/romance/short stories of the Tang and Song Dynasty
to own exclusively/unique to/specific/there is only
Europe/abbr. for 歐羅巴洲|欧罗巴洲[Ou1 luo2 ba1 Zhou1]
to stand out from the masses (idiom)
heredity/to inherit (a trait)/to pass on (to one's offspring)
